reaper:MarkoftheRose.NAME: Mark of the Rose
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, heal 1 HP.

reaper:DarkArts.NAME: Dark Arts
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal Damage equal to the amount of Dark Arts, lasts 1 turn.

reaper:DarkDimension.NAME: Dark Dimension
DESCRIPTIONS: Attack Damage Taken this turn is reduced by 60%. (Increases reduction by 2% per stack)

reaper:MarkofDeath.NAME: Mark of Death
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the every turn, enemy takes 10 damage. (Increases damage by 2 per stack)

reaper:MarkofBlood.NAME: Mark of Blood
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose 3 HP, The next attack played on this enemy deals double damage. (Increases by 0.5 per stack)

reaper:DarkMagicPower.NAME: Dark Magic
DESCRIPTIONS: Dark Arts to a random enemy at the start of your turn.

reaper:AnotherDimensionPower.NAME: Darkest Dimension
DESCRIPTIONS: Dark Dimension per stack start of your turn.

reaper:DarkestDexterity.NAME: Darkest Dexterity
DESCRIPTIONS: Dexterity per stack at the start of your turn.

reaper:ForcedRegionPower.NAME: Forced Region
DESCRIPTIONS: When ever you take damage, Gain

reaper:EvilTrinityPower.NAME: Evil Trinity
DESCRIPTIONS: Mark of Blood to ALL enemies at the start of your turn

reaper:PureDarknessPower.NAME: Pure Darkness
DESCRIPTIONS: Dark_Arts every time you play a card.

reaper:InevitablePower.NAME: InevitablePower
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you draw a card, Apply
Mark of Death to a random enemy.

reaper:DevilsStrengthPower.NAME: Devils Strength
DESCRIPTIONS: Strength every time you only play attack cards in a turn.

reaper:DevilsDefensePower.NAME: Devils Strength
DESCRIPTIONS: dexterity every time you only play skill cards in a turn.

reaper:CardSlashPower.NAME: Card Slash
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, Draw

reaper:VirtuousReaperPower.NAME: Virtuous Reaper
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply
